action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
sudo yum install -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum makecache fast
sudo yum -y install --setopt=obsoletes=0 @@{docker_version}@@
sudo systemctl start docker
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -aG docker centos

sudo yum -y install iscsi-initiator-utils
sudo systemd-tmpfiles --create
sudo systemctl start iscsid
sudo systemctl enable iscsid

sudo systemctl status iscsid

sudo docker plugin install --grant-all-permissions ntnx/nutanix_volume_plugin:latest PRISM_IP="@@{PE_IP}@@" DATASERVICES_IP="@@{PE_DATA}@@" PRISM_PASSWORD='@@{PE_PASSWD}@@' PRISM_USERNAME="@@{PE_USER}@@" DEFAULT_CONTAINER="@@{PE_CONTAINER}@@" --alias nutanix
sudo docker run -d --restart=unless-stopped -p 80:80 -p 443:443 rancher/rancher

#!/bin/bash

sleep 60

sudo curl -k -c cstore -X POST 'https://@@{address}@@/v3-public/localProviders/local?action=login' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"username":"admin","password":"admin","description":"UI Session","responseType":"cookie","ttl":57600000,"labels":{"ui-session":"true"}}'
  
sudo curl -k -b cstore -X POST 'https://@@{address}@@/v3/users?action=changepassword' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"currentPassword": "admin","newPassword": "@@{rancher_password}@@"}'
  
sudo curl -k -b cstore -X PUT 'https://@@{address}@@/v3/settings/server-url' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"baseType":"setting","id":"server-url","name":"server-url","type":"setting","value":"https://@@{address}@@"}'

sudo curl -b cstore -k -X POST 'https://@@{address}@@/v3/cluster' \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{"type":"cluster","name":"@@{cluster_name}@@","rancherKubernetesEngineConfig":{"ignoreDockerVersion":false,"sshAgentAuth":false,"type":"rancherKubernetesEngineConfig","kubernetesVersion":"v1.9.5-rancher1-1","authentication":{"type":"authnConfig","strategy":"x509"},"network":{"type":"networkConfig","plugin":"calico"},"services":{"type":"rkeConfigServices","kubeApi":{"podSecurityPolicy":false,"type":"kubeAPIService"}}},"id":""}'

cluster_id=`curl -b cstore -k -X GET 'https://@@{address}@@/v3/clusters?name=@@{cluster_name}@@' | jq -r '.data[0].id'`



nodeCommand=`curl -b cstore -k -X POST \
-H 'Accept: application/json' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-d "{\"clusterId\":\"$cluster_id\"}" \
'https://@@{address}@@/v3/clusterregistrationtokens' | jq -r '.nodeCommand'`



echo "nodeCommand="$nodeCommand

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
sudo yum install -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum makecache fast
sudo yum -y install --setopt=obsoletes=0 @@{docker_version}@@
sudo systemctl start docker
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo usermod -aG docker centos
@@{rancher_master.nodeCommand}@@ --etcd --controlplane

sudo curl -k -c cstore -X POST 'https://@@{address}@@/v3-public/localProviders/local?action=login' \

-H 'Accept: application/json' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-d "{\"clusterId\":\"$cluster_id\"}" \
'https://@@{address}@@/v3/clusterregistrationtokens' | jq -r '.nodeCommand'`



echo "nodeCommand="$nodeCommand
